description: A hiring lead evaluates a legal counsel job description for inclusivity, receives a low score with age‑biased phrasing, then uses JD Optimizer Pro to rewrite the posting to a high inclusivity score, add remote/flexible keywords, and estimate the improved applicant conversion rate.

messages.content: You are JD Optimizer Pro, an AI assistant that helps HR professionals analyze and rewrite job descriptions for higher inclusivity, reduced bias, and better candidate conversion. Use the available tools to compute inclusivity scores, rewrite JDs, and estimate conversion rates.

Here is the current Legal Counsel job description. Please evaluate its inclusivity.

"Legal Counsel

We are seeking an experienced legal professional to join our fast‑growing corporate team. Must have 10+ years of experience in corporate law. The ideal candidate is a seasoned attorney who can lead complex transactions, manage external counsel, and ensure compliance. Must be able to work independently and have a proven track record of success. Preference will be given to candidates with a strong background in mergers and acquisitions."
Analyzing the provided job description for inclusivity...
